content: 3 sts from end of firstneedles skp k1 work pattern on instep sts k1 k2 decrease knit remaining sts on fourth needle work one round with no decrease always maintaining pattern on instep repeat these two rounds until heel needles 1 & 4 have 16 sts on each needle foot work around as established until foot length is 1-1/2 less than desired length from back of heel toe decrease round work until 3 sts remain on first needle skp k 1 k1 k2tog k remaining sts on needle two knit sts on needle 3 until 3 sts remain skp k1 k1 k2 decrease k remaining sts on needle 4 knit two row repeat these three row twice then work decrease row every other row three times work decrease row every row until 5 sts remain on each needle combine sts from needles 1 and 4 on one needle and sts from needles 2 and 3 on one needle graft toe
